title: Health (Body Parts): Face (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Face subcategory within Health (Body Parts). Includes 6 card(s).

cards.english: Get me some eye drops on your way home.
cards.romaji: Kaeru toki ni me-gusuri o katte kite.
cards.japanese: 帰るときに目薬を買ってきて。
